metadata.physical_appearance: "The image shows a photograph that is in black-and-white. The photograph is displayed on a white paper. To the right of the photograph on the white paper, ""Christmas"" is stated. Below the photograph

metadata.subject_terms_2: an image of a lighted candle amongst mistletoes. Seven people are featured in the group portrait Portraits, Group Raffles Hotel Costume Christmas
metadata.subject_terms_3: and four of them are sitting down while the rest stand. All of them are wearing fancy dresses Raffles Hotel National holidays
metadata.subject_terms_4: such as the sailor and clown outfits. All except one don fancy headresses as well. "
